content: Which English rock band, formed in London in 1962, is considered one of the most influential bands in history with hits like "Paint It Black" and "Angie"?

I believe the English rock band you're referring to is The Rolling Stones. Formed in London in 1962, they have indeed been hugely influential in the music industry and have produced many classic hits, including "Paint It Black" and "Angie." The Rolling Stones are known for their blues-rock sound and have maintained a lasting impact on popular music for decades.
